content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mining Operation at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0) and a Chest at position(x=42.5, y=-83.5) for storing coal.

### Stone Furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0) for smelting stone into iron plates.

### Coal Storage at position(x=42.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a Chest at position(x=42.5, y=-83.5) for storing coal.

### Coal Transportation at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5)
Consists of a Burner Inserter at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5) for transporting coal from the mining operation to the storage chests.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from chests
- Ensure the chest contains the item being extracted before attempting to extract it.
### Errors when mining with a Burner Mining Drill
- Ensure the chest at the drop position is not full before continuing to mine.
### Errors when using a Burner Inserter
- Ensure the inserter has source items to pick up before attempting to transport items.
